title: dVRK tool list
description:
Configuration file format for an extra IO configuration file.  See the [dVRK documentation](https://dvrk.readthedocs.io).

 - This format is used by the dVRK system configuration file.
 - For details of implementation, see code under `sawIntuitiveResearchKit/core/components/code/IO_configuration.cdg`
 - [Schema file](dvrk-IO-configuration.schema.json)

name.description: Optional name for the IO, can be used to provide slightly more helpful error messages.

IO.description: Name of the IO declared in the `IOs` section of the overall system configuration file.

IO_file.description: File used to configure the IO.
